meaning_str.bing:
n. 爆炸；激增；突增；猛增
网络. 爆发；炸裂；爆炸声

爆炸；爆破；爆炸声；激增；爆发；迸发；突然爆发；突发的巨响

1.en: If you think that this explosion might have a long-term impact, it's a good idea to assess your life in general.
1.cn: 如果你认为这个爆炸或许会对你有长期的冲击，那么，重新评估一下你的生活是一个不错的方法。

2.en: At present, vehicle bomb has become the main means of the terror explosion. It has become a serious threat against the important buildings.
2.cn: 汽车炸弹作为当前恐怖爆炸最主要的方式之一，已经严重威胁到重要建筑物的安全。

3.en: She said investigators would be able to tell whether there was an explosion from possible residue on the bodies or other items.
3.cn: 她还说调查人员能够通过遇难者遗体或其他物品上的残留判断飞机是否出现爆炸。

0.en: How did I get here? Like, how the hell did I get here? Remember second grade, the Challenger explosion? You have got to stop with the Challenger explosion. There's something there.
0.cn: 我怎么会到这种地步？我怎么会变成这幅样子？,还记得二年级挑战者号爆炸吗？别再提挑战者号爆炸这事了。肯定有关系。

1.en: Do you remember a freight train passing by just before the explosion？Yes.
1.cn: 你记不记得爆炸时正好有辆货运列车经过？记得。

2.en: Ha! That's like saying the people near the nuclear explosion didn't do so well.
2.cn: 哈，就像是那些经历过核爆炸的人也会出毛病。

3.en: Actually, the explosion was caused by an implant in his neck. Here. Under that scar.
3.cn: 实际上，爆炸是他脖子上的植入物引起的。在这儿，就在伤疤下面。

4.en: Hey, Felix. Just wanted to check on you. I saw a big explosion or something go over the building there.
4.cn: 嘿阿修，只是想来检查看看，刚刚看到大楼上面有什么东西爆炸了一样。

5.en: The train explosion was the first attack of a series. There are going to be more. Now, did you find the bomb？
5.cn: 火车爆炸只是一系列袭击的第一波，接下来会有更多，你找到炸弹了吗？

6.en: Do you have any idea how many people would die if an explosion of that magnitude were to occur in the city？We're evacuating as we speak. We've to stop it before it happens, do you understand？
6.cn: 你知道如此程度的爆炸会使多少人丧命吗？说话这会儿，我们已经在疏散人群，我们得在炸弹爆炸之前阻止它，懂吗？

7.en: Many years ago I had a misfortune of being involved in an explosion and the consequence I get burned about 70% of my body.
7.cn: 多年之前，很不幸我因为一场爆炸事件导致全身约70%的皮肤烧伤。

8.en: And everything collapses, there's a big explosion. Some of the stuff is blown away, but the rest of it collapses into a black hole.
8.cn: 然后一切突然塌陷，并产生一个大爆炸。一些东西被吹走，但剩下的塌陷成一个黑洞。

9.en: Remarkable. In just under a half hour, 200 metric tons of fuel will ignite in a controlled explosion right beneath Howard's keister.
9.cn: 太震撼了，在半小时后，霍华德屁股的正下方将有200公吨燃料被定时爆炸装置点燃。

10.en: Okay, we won't pass even the credit check. According to my Social Security number, I died in a boat explosion years ago.
10.cn: 行，但是我们俩连信用核查都不会过，如果检查我的社保号码，会发现我好多年前就死于船只爆炸了。

11.en: Well, you know, I did unsettle it. I called you from the train. Just before the explosion, so 7:46 this morning they paged you with a call.
11.cn: 我刚还真就搅和了。我从车上给你打电话了，就在爆炸之前今早7点46分，他们呼叫了你…

12.en: The explosion was timed to engulf the passing freight train, which means, the bomber had to be watching both trains when the call was made. 52 callers, one of those is our bomber.
12.cn: 在爆炸发生的时刻货车刚好经过，这表明设弹人是在可见两车的情况下打的电话。52个人，其中一个是设弹人。

13.en: Our record show that 1812 calls ended at the moment of the explosion. 52 of those calls were tethered to the cell tower nearest the train, so one of those calls was made by our bomber.
13.cn: 数据显示爆炸时刻共有1812通电话完成通话，有52通电话经由离火车最近的信号塔转接，其中就有设弹人打的电话。

14.en: With all that's going on in the world, you really think that anyone's gonna give a damn about an explosion in some ghetto trash rat warren in Columbus? Sorrento, don't do this. I'm not even there! Not for long.
14.cn: 世界上太多的事正在发生，你以为会有人真的在乎哥伦布这种贫民窟中的老鼠洞发生的爆炸吗？索伦托，不要这样。我根本不在那里！很快就不在了。

15.en: The manpower required to drive this urban explosion has come from the rural backwaters of this vast nation.
15.cn: 驱动城市扩张所需的人力来自于辽阔中国的农村落后地区。

16.en: It's growing wealth and dynamism has created an incredible population explosion in an already expanding city.
16.cn: 日增的财富与活力造成了这个已然膨胀的城市惊人的人口激增。
